ants.name: Little Black Ant
ants.description: Little black ants are also known as black pharaoh ants!

ants.name: Fire Ant
ants.description: Fire ants are an invasive species, and they are also called red imported fire ants (RIFA).

spiders.name: Black Widow Spider
spiders.description: Western black widow spiders are considered to be the most venomous spider in North America, but their bites are not commonly fatal.

spiders.name: Yellow Garden Spider
spiders.description: Yellow garden spiders are a species of orb-weaver spiders, due to their circular webs.
